attributes.action: Pay All The People (NHS), who are working through the Coronavirus a Wage Bonus.
attributes.additional_details:
...Pay All The Key Worker Staff... who are still working through the Coronavirus a Danger Money Bonus.
To give everyone a "Bonus" to say thank you for carrying on working through all the stress and upset or the Coronavirus, and for giving the support to all the people who need their work at such a desperate time.
attributes.background: "Income Bonus" for Key Workers ie. NHS Staff, Carers, The Services (Police, Fire, Military etc.,).  Safety Companies, Supermarket/Bank/Shop staff, and all other essential company workers we all need "DANGER MONEY for having to work through this KILLER VIRUS.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for the same action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307619
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303306

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
